div.p: RSU 38 Presenters at National NCTM Conference!
Please enjoy this video expressing how much the Readfield Elementary School Faculty and Staff miss their students! RES Message to Students (updated)

img.alt: A Message from the MCHS Faculty & Staff

h3.a: A Message from the MCHS Faculty & Staff

div.p: Good morning! Please enjoy this video expressing how much Faculty and Staff miss their students!A Message from the MCHS Faculty & Staff to Students
In RSU #38, if you or someone you know is in need of food, we can help! Food Boxes can be picked up on Fridays from 3-4pm at Maranacook High School. Just drive up, grab and go!
RSU 38 CoVid-19 update: April 13, 2020 Remote Learning extended for remainder of school year. Visit Maranacook.org for full letter from Superintendent.
RSU 38 Covid 19 updates as of April 3, 2020. Please visit https://www.maranacook.org/article/226235?org=rsu-38 for complete information.

Clarification for Middle school drive thru pick ups - if you did not request a pick up for supplies then no need to go to the school. This service is only if you contacted the school for supplies earlier in the week. Sorry for any confusion the original message may have caused.
Reminder: Maranacook Middle School essential material pick up tomorrow, Friday, March 27 from 7:30 to 9 am AND 4 to 5 pm. Remote learning begins Monday, March 30!
